traits.name: Paranoid
traits.desc: Can opportunistically declare war at Suspicious reputation level.

traits.name: Predatory
traits.desc: Can opportunistically declare war regardless of disposition score, at Favorable (Suspicious if Player) reputation level or lower

traits.name: Pacifist
traits.desc: Will never opportunistically declare war.

traits.name: Helps Allies
traits.desc: Disposition penalties towards enemies of our friends/allies. Will always vote yes for an alliance action.

traits.name: Rebel
traits.desc: Doubled dominance effect for opportunistic war declaration calculation.

traits.name: Irredentist
traits.desc: +50% disposition penalties from revanchism.

traits.name: Stalwart
traits.desc: -33% war weariness gains.

traits.name: Weak-willed
traits.desc: +50% war weariness gains.

traits.name: Forever War
traits.desc: Zero war weariness.

traits.name: One True Way
traits.desc: Doubled disposition effects from alignment.

traits.name: Temperamental
traits.desc: +25% to all disposition effects.

traits.name: Dislikes AI
traits.desc: Disposition penalty for use of AI cores.

traits.name: Hates AI
traits.desc: Heavy disposition penalty for use of AI cores.

traits.name: Likes AI
traits.desc: Disposition bonus for use of AI cores.

traits.name: Envious
traits.desc: +50% disposition penalty from dominance.

traits.name: Submissive
traits.desc: Dominance disposition penalty becomes a bonus instead.

traits.name: Neutralist
traits.desc: No disposition penalty from dominance.

traits.name: Monopolist
traits.desc: Disposition penalty from economic competition. Looser relationship limits on targeting other factions for economic sabotage.

traits.name: Law & Order
traits.desc: Disposition penalty from free ports.

traits.name: Anarchistic
traits.desc: Disposition bonus from free ports.

traits.name: Low Profile
traits.desc: Markets less likely to be targeted for raids/invasions, if the attacker has multiple enemies. Effect diminishes with empire size.

traits.name: Devious
traits.desc: Agent actions have increased chance of execution, success rate and effect.

traits.name: Monstrous
traits.desc: This faction is seen as inhuman, and not in a cute way. Disposition penalties from everyone, and reduced rep penalty on the player for atrocities against this faction.
